Introduction
This topic contains procedures for handling decision reviews and legacy appeals for IU, including
pursuit of subsequent IU claims or reviews
issues to adjudicate in supplemental IU claims
development for
VA Form 21-8940
during a supplemental IU claim
, and
employment and VR&E information during a supplemental IU claim
issues within scope of supplemental IU claims
handling issues identified on a
VA Form 21-8940
received during a supplemental claim
requesting examinations for supplemental IU claims
handling mixed submission claims
incorporating IU denial into a pending legacy appeal
prohibition against incorporating rated issues into a legacy IU appeal
, and
IU effective dates associated with appellate status
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section C - Individual Unemployability (IU) Rating and Decision Review
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section C
